visualization_prompt: Generate a line chart showing monthly financial performance with positive/negative trends using custom legend symbols and dual-color encoding
visualization_explanation: The dataset contains 12 monthly observations (univariate time-series) with synthetic profit margin percentages. Data exhibits an upward trend (μ=+5.8% growth/month) with realistic variance (σ=6.2%), combining seasonal recovery patterns and business cycle fluctuations. Synthetic values maintain domain consistency (-15% to +20% range) using Brownian motion with positive drift. The dual-color line chart maximizes data-ink ratio by encoding sign information directly in the stroke color, while the custom legend symbols (≠ default markers) improve visual discrimination per Cairo's principles. Temporal spacing uses proportional intervals with Date.UTC formatting, and the zone-based coloring provides immediate positive/negative performance recognition.
